title: 110: Defending Our Controversial Opinions
itunes:title: Defending Our Controversial Opinions
itunes:author: The Try Guys & Ramble
itunes:subtitle: Hot take alert!!!
content:encoded:
This week we have 60 seconds on the clock to give a spicy hot take, and then the others rip it apart. Lines are drawn. People are divided. Hobbies are trashed.
